fields.Name: Get JotForm Submissions
fields.Description: Retrieves submissions from a JotForm with filtering, pagination, and ordering capabilities. Supports regional endpoints (US, EU, HIPAA) and offset-based pagination through all submissions.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: Limit
fields.Description: Number of submissions per page (1-1000, default 20)

fields.Name: Offset
fields.Description: Number of submissions to skip for pagination (default 0)

fields.Name: OrderBy
fields.Description: Field to sort by with direction (e.g., 'created_at,DESC' or 'id,ASC')

fields.Name: GetAllPages
fields.Description: If true, automatically fetch all pages of submissions (up to MaxSubmissions)

fields.Name: MaxSubmissions
fields.Description: Maximum submissions to retrieve when GetAllPages is true (default 10000)

fields.Name: Submissions
fields.Description: Array of submission objects with all answers, metadata, and submission details

fields.Name: TotalSubmissions
fields.Description: Total number of submissions available for the form

fields.Name: Count
fields.Description: Number of submissions returned in this request

fields.Name: NextOffset
fields.Description: Offset value to use for next page

fields.Name: HasMore
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if more submissions are available
Context user is required for JotForm API calls

fields.Name: Get Single JotForm Submission
fields.Description: Retrieves details of a specific JotForm submission by its unique submission ID. Includes all answers, metadata, and submission status.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: SubmissionID
fields.Description: The unique submission ID to retrieve

fields.Name: Submission
fields.Description: Complete submission object with all answers and metadata

fields.Name: Answers
fields.Description: Object with all field answers keyed by question ID

fields.Name: Get JotForm Response Statistics
fields.Description: Calculates comprehensive statistics from JotForm submissions including response counts, trends, popular answers, and time-based analytics. Useful for dashboards and reporting.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: Filter
fields.Description: JSON object with filters for date range analysis (e.g., {created_at:gt:2024-01-01})

fields.Name: IncludeTopAnswers
fields.Description: Calculate most popular answers for each field (default true)

fields.Name: TopAnswersLimit
fields.Description: Number of top answers to return per field (default 10)

fields.Name: Statistics
fields.Description: Complete statistics object with all calculated metrics

fields.Name: DailyBreakdown
fields.Description: Array of daily statistics with date and submission counts

fields.Name: HourlyDistribution
fields.Description: Array showing submission distribution by hour of day (0-23)

fields.Name: TopAnswers
fields.Description: Most popular answers by field ID

fields.Name: Export JotForm Submissions to CSV
fields.Description: Exports JotForm submissions to CSV format for use in spreadsheets, data analysis tools, or archival. Supports custom delimiters and optional metadata columns.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: Filter
fields.Description: JSON object with filters for submissions to export (e.g., {created_at:gt:2024-01-01})

fields.Name: IncludeMetadata
fields.Description: Include metadata columns (IP address, submission time, status) - default true

fields.Name: CSVData
fields.Description: CSV formatted string ready for export or storage

fields.Name: RowCount
fields.Description: Number of data rows in the CSV

fields.Name: ColumnCount
fields.Description: Number of columns in the CSV

fields.Name: FileSize
fields.Description: Size of CSV data in bytes
No submissions found matching the criteria

fields.Name: Watch for New JotForm Submissions
fields.Description: Polls JotForm for new submissions since the last check. Returns only new submissions and updates the last checked timestamp. Perfect for triggering workflows, sending notifications, or syncing data to other systems.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: FormID
fields.Description: The JotForm form ID to monitor

fields.Name: LastCheckedTimestamp
fields.Description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last check. If not provided, uses DefaultLookbackMinutes.

fields.Name: DefaultLookbackMinutes
fields.Description: If LastCheckedTimestamp not provided, look back this many minutes (default 60)

fields.Name: OnlyCompleted
fields.Description: Only return ACTIVE status submissions (default false)

fields.Name: NewSubmissions
fields.Description: Array of new submissions since last check

fields.Name: HasNewSubmissions
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if any new submissions were found

fields.Name: LastChecked
fields.Description: Updated timestamp to use for next check

fields.Name: PreviouslyChecked
fields.Description: The timestamp that was used for this check

fields.Name: CompletedCount
fields.Description: Number of ACTIVE status submissions in the new set

fields.Name: PartialCount
fields.Description: Number of other status submissions in the new set
No new submissions since last check

fields.Name: Get JotForm Details
fields.Description: Retrieves complete details of a JotForm including title, questions, properties, and settings. Use this to inspect or backup form configurations.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: FormID
fields.Description: The JotForm form ID to retrieve

fields.Name: FormDetails
fields.Description: Complete form object with all configuration

fields.Name: FormURL
fields.Description: Public URL to access the form

fields.Name: QuestionCount
fields.Description: Number of questions in the form

fields.Name: Questions
fields.Description: Complete questions object keyed by question ID

fields.Name: Create JotForm
fields.Description: Creates a new JotForm with specified title, questions, and properties. Supports all JotForm field types including text, email, multiple choice, rating, and more. Returns the new form ID and shareable link.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: Questions
fields.Description: Array of question objects. Each needs: type, text, and optional properties. Types: control_text, control_textarea, control_email, control_number, control_dropdown, control_radio, control_checkbox, control_rating, control_datetime, control_fileupload, etc.

fields.Name: AdminURL
fields.Description: Admin/builder URL to edit the form
Questions parameter is required and must be a non-empty array

fields.Name: Update JotForm
fields.Description: Updates an existing JotForm. Supports merging with existing form data to safely update only specified properties, or full replacement mode. Can update title, questions, and properties.

fields.Name: CompanyID
fields.Description: The MemberJunction Company ID for credential lookup (optional - defaults to user's company)

fields.Name: FormID
fields.Description: The JotForm form ID to update

fields.Name: MergeWithExisting
fields.Description: If true (default), fetches existing form and merges your changes. If false, replaces entire form with your data (DANGEROUS)

fields.Name: Title
fields.Description: New title for the form (optional if MergeWithExisting=true)

fields.Name: Questions
fields.Description: Questions object to merge or replace (keyed by question ID)

fields.Name: Properties
fields.Description: Form properties to update (merged with existing if MergeWithExisting=true)

fields.Name: UpdatedFields
fields.Description: Array of field names that were modified
At least one update parameter (Title, Questions, Properties) must be provided
